page.title: 10A day in the life of Suzanne
page.content: A typical day starts at about{8.00 in the morning when I get up. The first thing I do is get dressed, then I go downstairs and have my breakfast. I have Rice Crispies. At about{8.45 } my friend Clare who lives down the road comes round to my house. Then at about{9.00}we walk to school. When we get to school we have a bit of a play and then school starts at{9.15.}The usual work at first is maths. We have a playtime half way through the morning at{10.40}and half way through the afternoon at{2.15.}Our lunchtime starts at{12.15}and ends at{1.15}. Everyone brings their own packed lunch. At{3.15}the bell goes for home time.
